mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'It is high time to do something' mean?

options.a: It is the best moment to relax
options.b: It is already late to start doing something that should have been done earlier
options.c: It is the perfect time to celebrate
options.d: It is an opportunity to reach new heights

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'It is high time to do something' means that it is already late for something that should have been done earlier and action should be taken immediately.
